text: Comme des Garçons (CDG) is a French fashion company started by Rei Kawakubo in Paris. The label started in 1969 and the company started in 1973. The company also makes jewelry and perfume. ==References== Category:Fashion houses Category:Companies based in Paris Category:Manufacturing companies of Japan Category:1970s establishments in Japan Category:1973 establishments in Asia Category:Companies based in Tokyo
title: Comme des Garçons
